Workflow.Name: [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Update Planning Data Target
Workflow.Description: When the Risk Frequency of an Operation Activity Risk Score is updated, it will look up the related Planning Data Target and update it with the Risk Frequency's Planning Data Target Weight.

LocalizedName.description: [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Update Planning Data Target

Description.description: When the Risk Frequency of an Operation Activity Risk Score is updated, it will look up the related Planning Data Target and update it with the Risk Frequency's Planning Data Target Weight.
